source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000010_KRILE<tab>You're here. Good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000010_KRILE<tab>あら、来てくれていたのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000020_TATARU<tab>So...how are they?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000020_TATARU<tab>それで……みなさんの様子はどうでっすか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000030_KRILE<tab>Still locked in slumber. But otherwise in good physical health.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000030_KRILE相変わらず、昏睡状態が続いているわ。
まるで眠っているように、体に異常は見られない……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000040_KRILE<tab>...For the present, at least.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000040_KRILEと、言いたいところなのだけれど、
実は変化の兆しが見られるのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000050_TATARU<tab>For the present?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000050_TATARU<tab>変化……でっすか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000060_TATARU<tab>...Oh no, is something wrong with them!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000060_TATARUハッ……？
もしかして、相談したかったことって……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000070_KRILE<tab>I'm afraid there may be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000070_KRILE<tab>ええ、そうよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000080_KRILE<tab>I summoned you after detecting faint signs of instability in Thancred's corporeal aether. But subsequent examinations suggested all five might be affected. And when I examined them just now, my fears were confirmed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000080_KRILE微かにだけれど……みんなの肉体に残るエーテル、
つまり、魂以外の生命力とでも言い換えればいいかしら。
そこに揺らぎが見られるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000090_KRILE<tab>Tellingly, the degree of instability varies between them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000090_KRILE今すぐに、どうにかなるというほどの変化ではないけれど、
その揺らぎに個人差があるのが気になるのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000100_KRILE<tab>Thancred exhibits the most notable signs, followed by Y'shtola and Urianger. The twins' aether, meanwhile, remains relatively stable, but there is a change there too if one knows to look for it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000100_KRILEいちばん、揺らぎが大きいのはサンクレッドさん。
次いで、ヤ・シュトラとウリエンジェさん……。
一方、アルフィノくんとアリゼーには、ほとんど変化はなし。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000110_TATARU<tab>Hold on─isn't that the order they were called away in?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000110_TATARU<tab>それって……倒れた順でっすよね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000120_KRILE<tab>Indeed. Which leads me to believe the instability will only increase with time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000120_KRILEそのとおりよ。
つまり、魂が分離してから時間が経過している人ほど、
生命力の揺らぎが大きくなっているってことね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000130_KRILE<tab>Though I can but speculate, I fear this may be a symptom of a weakening link between body and soul.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000130_KRILEこれは推論に過ぎないけれど、
魂と肉体の結びつきが、弱まりつつあるのかもしれないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000140_TATARU<tab>By the gods... What happens if the link is broken?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000140_TATARUたたたたた、大変でっす！
その結びつきが完全に断たれてしまったら、
どうなるでっすか！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000150_KRILE<tab>I cannot say for certain─this is all unknown territory to us. Yet whatever happens, it cannot be good.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000150_KRILEこんな症状はじめてだから、確かなことは何も言えないわ。
でも、決していい結果になるとは思えない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000160_KRILE<tab>Mercifully, the instability is still only slight. And you may rest assured Master Matoya and I will do everything in our power to keep it from worsening.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000160_KRILE先程も言ったけれど、まだ揺らぎはとても小さいわ。
それに、私もマトーヤ様と連携して、
肉体を保つための努力はしてみるつもり。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000170_KRILE<tab>Be that as it may, it is imperative that you find a way to restore our friends' souls to their bodies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000170_KRILEだから、その間……
あなたには彼らの魂を帰還させる方法を探してほしいの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Leave it to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>任せておけ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>No rest for the righteous, eh?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>もう慣れている

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000180_KRILE<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000180_KRILE<tab>ありがとう、頼りにさせてもらうわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000190_KRILE<tab>I realize you've only just returned from saving two worlds, but time is not on our side.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000190_KRILEふたつの世界を救う戦いを終えたばかりだというのに、
ごめんなさいね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000200_TATARU<tab>But where's <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> even supposed to start? We had the greatest minds in the realm hunting high and low for an answer, and they ran out of places to look.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000200_TATARUでもでも、探すと言ってもどうやって！？
これまでも専門家さんたちに力を借りて調べてきたのに、
まだ何も……手がかりすらつかめていないんでっすよ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000210_KRILE<tab>You stated in your report that the Exarch had originally intended to reverse the summoning process by means of his own death, correct?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000210_KRILE確か……あなたの報告によれば、
水晶公は、召喚者である自らの死を以て、
賢人たちの魂を原初世界に返すつもりだったのよね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000220_KRILE<tab>Raha always was a reckless young fool... Ready to die for the first righteous cause that came along.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000220_KRILEシャーレアンにいたころのラハくんを知る身としては、
その決断に思うところもあるけれど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000230_KRILE<tab>His plan might well have worked, but I for one am glad he never had the opportunity to see it through. Even if it does mean our friends must remain stranded awhile longer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000230_KRILE何にせよ、幸いにして彼の命は救われ、
結果的に、賢人たちも第一世界に留まることになった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000240_KRILE<tab>There is another way, I am sure of it. And the key lies with him. With the Exarch.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000240_KRILEそうなるとやっぱり、魂の帰還を実現するには、
召喚術の要となっている、水晶公の協力が不可欠よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000250_KRILE<tab>Pray return to the First and apprise him and the others of the situation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000250_KRILEだから、この肉体の変化に関する情報を携えて、
もう一度、第一世界に渡り、水晶公たちと協議してもらいたいの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000260_KRILE<tab>We, meanwhile, will do what we can from here and, if the fates are kind, we will have good news to share upon your return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000260_KRILEもちろん、原初世界側からのフォローは徹底させてもらうわ。
だから……よろしくね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000270_URIANGER<tab>Pray excuse my late arrival.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000270_URIANGER<tab>失礼……遅くなりました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000280_YSHTOLA<tab>Will Thancred and Ryne not be joining us?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000280_YSHTOLAあら、サンクレッドとリーンも、
一緒だったのではなくて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000290_URIANGER<tab>Nay, milady. With apologies to all, they beg leave to pursue their investigation of the Empty to its conclusion. Should matters here demand their presence, however, they did assure me that they would make themselves available.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000290_URIANGER彼らは「無の大地」に関する調査に注力したいと……。
急ぎ、手が必要なときには呼ぶよう、言付かっております。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000300_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Yes, of course. Then let us proceed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000300_MYSTERYVOICE確かに、彼らが担う調査も重大事だ。
今は、ここに集った者で問題を検討しよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000310_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I...I think it best that you begin by providing a summary of Mistress Krile's findings.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000310_MYSTERYVOICEさて、皆にはすでに概要を伝えてあるが……
あなたが原初世界で聞いたことを、改めて報告してもらっても？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000320_ALPHINAUD<tab>I suppose it was only to be expected that some change would occur...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000320_ALPHINAUD<tab>生命力に揺らぎ、か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000330_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet our souls seem unaffected. To my eye, at least.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000330_YSHTOLA魂であるこちらの私たちには、
今のところ、異常は視られないわね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000340_YSHTOLA<tab>How long they will remain so is another question. Krile is right. It is imperative we find a way to return to the Source.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000340_YSHTOLAさりとて、この状態を維持し続けられる確証もない……
いずれにせよ、帰還方法を真剣に探すべきでしょうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Perhaps an explanation of the method by which I brought you here will yield some inspiration.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000350_MYSTERYVOICEあなたにも、私の用いた召喚術について、
一度、きちんと説明しておこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ere I begin, it must be noted that I am by no means a gifted mage. In order to employ powerful magicks, I must rely upon the Crystal Tower and its boundless reservoirs of energy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000360_MYSTERYVOICE……そもそも、私は優秀な魔法使いなどではなくてね。
大がかりな術を扱うときには、
この塔の機能と、そこに蓄えられたエネルギーを用いているのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000370_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The magick that summoned you was no exception. 'Tis a singular spell, adapted through painstaking effort from the technique that transported me to the First.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000370_MYSTERYVOICE皆や、あなたを喚んだ術も、例外ではない。
遠い未来で確立され、私を第一世界へと送った機能……
それを四苦八苦しながら転用した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000380_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>To use an analogy, it works by cutting a hole in the fabric of reality. A hole tailored to the object of summoning, through which it─and it alone─may pass unscathed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000380_MYSTERYVOICE乱暴な言い方をしてしまえば、
世界の壁に、対象者だけが通れる穴をあけて、
この塔のもとへと引っ張ってくる、といったものなのだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000390_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though I succeeded in creating said hole, I failed to latch onto my intended target. Instead of you, the spell found those close to you, and ended up summoning them in their incomplete state...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000390_MYSTERYVOICEあなた以外の皆は、想定外の召喚だったため、
その穴が完璧には開けられなかった……という具合だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000400_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I would not soon throw my life away─not after the lengths you and yours went to save it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000400_MYSTERYVOICE……私はもう、どんな役目を背負っていても、
生きることを投げ出さない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so long as I breathe, I will spare no effort to see you safely home.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000410_MYSTERYVOICEあの海の底まで救いにきてくれた、あなたに誓って……
今回の件だって、何が何でも解決法を探してみせる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000420_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But should all else fail, and your lives be at stake, there remains one sure method...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000420_MYSTERYVOICEだが……もしそれが間に合わず、
皆の身に危機が迫るようなことがあれば……
当初の方法を選ぶことも、ためらわないでくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ow!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>いでっ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>What was that for!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>いきなり、何を……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000450_ALISAIE<tab>How can you even entertain such thoughts!? You owe your life to the Warrior of Light, and you don't get to die unless <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> says so.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000450_ALISAIE「もし」の話でも、気に食わなかっただけよ。
それで生き延びたって、あの人が悲しい顔するなら、
最低最悪のやり方だわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000460_YSHTOLA<tab>Your followers await your divine judgment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000460_YSHTOLA<tab>ほうぼうから愛されて大変ね、英雄さん？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000470_ALISAIE<tab>Excuse me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000470_ALISAIE<tab>はぁっ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pardon?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000480_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>なっ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000485_YSHTOLA<tab>[Report if label displays]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000485_YSHTOLA<tab>あ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000490_YSHTOLA<tab>If the two of you have finished, perhaps we could return to our discussion?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000490_YSHTOLA<tab>さ、そろそろ議論に戻りましょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000500_YSHTOLA<tab>Rather than dwelling upon the multiple failed attempts at transference, I think it would behoove us to focus on the solitary success.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000500_YSHTOLAまず検討すべきは、
私たちのような不完全な転移の事例ではないと思うの。
完全な成功例が、この場にいるんだから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000510_YSHTOLA<tab>I would draw your attention to the fact that our friend can travel between worlds possessed not only of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> body and soul, but <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> personal effects besides.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000510_YSHTOLAここで注目すべきは、魂と肉体の転移のみならず、
装備や持ち物を含む物質を伴い、次元の狭間を超えている点よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000520_YSHTOLA<tab>This is no different from the teleportation magicks to which we are all accustomed─magicks that allow for the transportation of those inanimate objects one considers to be an extension of oneself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000520_YSHTOLAテレポに代表される転移魔法では、
自己の延長線上に物質を置くことで転移を実現しているの。
その際、鍵となるのが「これは自分の物である」という認識よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Are you suggesting that, simply by considering us his possessions, he could carry our souls back to the Source upon his person?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000530_ALPHINAUDなるほど。
つまり私たちの魂を、彼が「自分の物」だと認識すれば、
原初世界に持ち帰ることができる、と？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000540_ALPHINAUD<tab>Are you suggesting that, simply by considering us her possessions, she could carry our souls back to the Source upon her person?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000540_ALPHINAUDなるほど。
つまり私たちの魂を、彼女が「自分の物」だと認識すれば、
原初世界に持ち帰ることができる、と？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000550_ALISAIE<tab>Well, it would be nice if things were that simple for a change.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000550_ALISAIE<tab>それで済むなら話がはやいわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000560_ALISAIE<tab>But vague notions of ownership seem a rather tenuous thing to stake our lives on. So much as a moment of doubt on <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> part, and we'd be left floating in the rift.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000560_ALISAIEでも、そんな簡単に他人を物だなんて思える？
少しでも疑念を抱いた瞬間、次元の狭間に放り出される……
なんてことだったら、さすがに危険すぎよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000570_URIANGER<tab>Milady hath the right of it. The requisite fixity of belief would be too much to ask even of our friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000570_URIANGER<tab>アリゼー様の懸念は、ごもっともでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000580_URIANGER<tab>Yet were we to immure our souls within an object in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> possession, mayhap then our safe passage could be assured.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000580_URIANGERですが、魂を何らかの物質に収めてしまえば話は別……
我らが魔女は、そう言いたいのではありませんか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000590_URIANGER<tab>White auracite would, I believe, serve as a suitable vessel for this purpose. 'Twas conceived to imprison the massy soul of an Ascian, and should house one of ours with relative ease.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000590_URIANGERならば、「白聖石」が役立つはず……。
あの魔器は、元々、アシエンの魂を捕らえるため創られた物。
より魂の質量が小さい我々であれば、収められて当然です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000600_URIANGER<tab>We would need only to ensure our souls' safe preservation inside the stone, and identify a means by which they might be transferred back unto our vacant bodies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000600_URIANGER「白聖石」に収められた魂を、
安全に維持する方法、そして肉体に移し替える方法。
このふたつを確立できれば、原初世界への帰還も叶いましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Soul preservation and transference... Hm. I believe I know of someone who may be able to assist us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000610_MYSTERYVOICE魂の維持と、移し替えか……。
であれば、私からも提案できることがありそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>On the far shore of the Source, there stands a great palace built by the elves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000620_MYSTERYVOICEレイクランドの「始まりの湖」、
その対岸に、かつてエルフたちが築いた宮殿があってね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000630_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It was forsaken in the wake of the Flood, but a certain Nu Mou chose to make their home there soon after.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000630_MYSTERYVOICE「光の氾濫」の折、放棄されたようなのだが、
そんな場所を根城とする風変わりなン・モゥの隠者がいるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000640_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though they have long lived as a recluse, they once occupied a place of honor in Voeburt's royal court, and it is said that none in all of Norvrandt is more knowledgeable than they on matters of the soul.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000640_MYSTERYVOICEかつてフッブート王国の王宮にも出入りしていた魔道士で、
特に「魂」に関する研究で知られていたと聞く。
ここは隠者殿に、知恵を借りてみてはどうだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000650_ALISAIE<tab>Well, I've no objection to seeking a helping hand, but if they've gone to such lengths to hide themselves away from the world, what makes you think they'd be willing to lend us one?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000650_ALISAIEもちろん、反対する気はないけれど……
そんなに名高い魔道士が、廃墟で隠れて暮らしてるなんて、
よほどの事情がありそうじゃない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000660_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Heh. A worthy question. Years ago, I myself tried─and failed─to solicit their cooperation in the battle against the sin eaters.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000660_MYSTERYVOICEおそらく、そのとおりだ。
私も数十年前に、罪喰いの対策に関して協力を仰ごうと、
接触を試みたことがあったのだが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000670_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>No sooner had I begun to make my plea than they unleashed a swarm of their familiars upon me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000670_MYSTERYVOICE使い魔をけしかけられて、まともに交渉すらできなかったよ。
どうやら、相当な人嫌いらしい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000680_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Unlike me, however, you have curried favor with the fae folk. By that merit alone, I am hopeful that they would grant you an audience.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000680_MYSTERYVOICEだが、気難しいイル・メグの妖精たちとも、
縁を結んだあなた方であれば、あるいはと思ってね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000690_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>They may still be inclined to turn you away, of course, but if their knowledge might feasibly facilitate your return home, we have to try.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000690_MYSTERYVOICE場合によっては、荒事になるだろうが……
ここはひとつ、隠者殿を訪ねてみようじゃないか。
もちろん、あなた方さえよければ、だがね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000700_BEQLUGG<tab>That was my fiercest familiar. Impressive...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000700_BEQLUGG<tab>なんともはや、自慢の使い魔までもが倒されるとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Beq Lugg. 'Tis good to see you again after all these years.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000710_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>宮殿に住まいし隠者……「ベーク＝ラグ」殿とお見受けする。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000720_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And judging by your vigorous greeting, I daresay the feeling is mutual. To be sure, a simple <var 1A 02 /var>shake<var 1A 01 /var> of the hand would have sufficed by way of welcome, but I shan't complain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000720_MYSTERYVOICEあなたにとって、我々は招かれざる客なのだろう。
少々、手荒な歓迎を受けたもので、
無礼を承知ながら、全力で応じさせていただいた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000730_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But you must be wondering as to the purpose of our visit. We come to <var 1A 02 /var>beg<var 1A 01 /var> your assistance in a most urgent matter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000730_MYSTERYVOICEだが、戦いは本意ではない。
私たちは、助力を「お願い」すべく訪ねてきたのだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000740_BEQLUGG<tab>...Sh-Shake? Beg?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000740_BEQLUGG<tab>……お願い……だと？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000750_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Our comrades' very souls are in danger. If we are to save them, we will need the benefit of your unsurpassed knowledge on the matter. Please, will you not <var 1A 02 /var>sit<var 1A 01 /var> and hear our plea?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000750_MYSTERYVOICEそう、私の仲間たちの命を救うため、
長年に亘り魂の研究をしてきた、あなたの知恵をお借りしたい。
その「お願い」に来たのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000760_BEQLUGG<tab>Oh... How dare you. How dare you speak thus in my presence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000760_BEQLUGGぐぬぅ……「お願い」……
な、なんとも抗いがたき甘美な響き……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000770_BEQLUGG<tab>It was to escape such words of temptation that I hid myself from the world of men...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000770_BEQLUGGその言葉を投げかけられたくないがゆえに、
こうして人里離れた廃墟に移り住んだというに……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000780_BEQLUGG<tab>You are sinners one and all, and I swore never again to have any part in your affairs.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000780_BEQLUGGいいや、ダメだ、ダメだ……！
ワシはヒトの悪意に絶望し、生涯、お願いなど聞かぬと、
心に誓ったのだッ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000790_ALPHINAUD<tab>I can only imagine what terrible events forced you into a life of seclusion...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000790_ALPHINAUD対価の収集家たるン・モゥ族が、
取引を拒むからには、相応の理由がおありなのでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000800_ALPHINAUD<tab>But I know that the Nu Mou are a good and noble folk. It is not in your nature to turn a blind eye to the plight of those around you. And in treating with us, I am certain whatever mistrust you feel for man will begin to...<var 1A 02 /var>heel<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000800_ALPHINAUDですが、重ねて「お願い」させていただきたい。
私を含めて、幾人もの命が関わる事案なのです……。
どうか、話だけでも聞いてはいただけないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000810_BEQLUGG<tab>Ahhh....
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000810_BEQLUGG<tab>ふぁーッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000820_BEQLUGG<tab>If you will not be satisfied... I suppose I could listen... After all, there's no harm in just─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000820_BEQLUGG話だけ……？　本当に話を聞くだけ……？
それくらいなら……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000830_BEQLUGG<tab>No! No, no, no! I mustn't. Not again...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000830_BEQLUGG<tab>いいや、やっぱりダメだ、誓いを立てたのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000840_BEQLUGG<tab>That damned court mage seemed to have the best of intentions too, and countless innocents died for my naivety!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000840_BEQLUGGよりにもよって、お前たちはワシの知恵を求めているのだろう？
かつてワシが裏切り者の宮廷魔道士に知恵を貸したばかりに、
多くの犠牲が出たのだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000850_BEQLUGG<tab>You know not what you ask of me. What horrors my knowledge has wrought...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000850_BEQLUGGお前たちは、あの恐ろしい事件を知らないから、
安々と知恵を借りたいなどと言えるのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Refuse all you want! We won't lie down and accept defeat!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>それでも「お願い」したい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We would never misuse it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>決して知恵を悪用しないと誓う！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>You mean the magical plague of Voeburt?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>フッブート王国の魔物化事件のことか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000860_BEQLUGG<tab>Ahhh! Ohhh!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000860_BEQLUGG<tab>フーッ、フーッ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000870_BEQLUGG<tab>Of all the visitors I could possibly have... They're even more stubborn than I am...!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000870_BEQLUGGし、辛抱たまらん……！
こう何度も「お願い」されては……どうにかなりそうだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000880_BEQLUGG<tab>You wish only to save your friends? Nothing more?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000880_BEQLUGG<tab>我が知恵を、仲間の命を救うためだけに使う、と……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000890_BEQLUGG<tab>Do you swear it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000890_BEQLUGG<tab>心より誓うと申すのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000900_BEQLUGG<tab>You know of the plague!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000900_BEQLUGG<tab>なんと、あの事件を知っておったか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000910_BEQLUGG<tab>Then you know how dangerous soulcraft can be! Instead of saving your friends, you risk damning them. Are you sure you're willing to take that chance?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000910_BEQLUGGだが、ワシは知恵を貸したばかりに、
あの男は魔物化の魔法を完成させたのだぞ？
その忌まわしい知恵を、借りたいと申すのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000920_BEQLUGG<tab>Mmmm....
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000920_BEQLUGG<tab>うーん、うーん……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000930_BEQLUGG<tab>Oh, very well...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000930_BEQLUGG<tab>よ、よかろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000940_BEQLUGG<tab>I will hear your petition, but that is all! And I expect fitting payment for my troubles...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000940_BEQLUGGいいか、ちょ～っと、話を聞くだけだぞ……？
相応の「対価」を必ず支払うのだぞ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Commensurate with your contribution to our cause. No more and no less, I promise you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>釣り合いの取れた対価を支払うと、約束しよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>With that settled─might I impose upon you to join us at the Crystarium? I'm afraid the nature of my friends' predicament calls for absolute secrecy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000960_MYSTERYVOICEそれでは是非、私たちと共にクリスタリウムへ。
少々、込み入った事情となるが話を聞いていただきたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000970_BEQLUGG<tab>I'm sorry... You mean to tell me not only that the return of night was your doing...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000970_BEQLUGG……まさか、おぬしたちが、
夜に闇を取り戻していたとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000980_BEQLUGG<tab>...But that you hail from another world as well!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000980_BEQLUGG<tab>それに加えて、異界からの来訪者だと……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Everything we told you─of the Source, the shards, the seven Umbral Calamities─all of it is true.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_000990_MYSTERYVOICE古の時代に分かたれた十三の鏡像世界……
そして、過去、七度発生した霊災による世界の統合。
これまで語った言葉に、嘘偽りはないと誓おう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I realize how fantastical it sounds, and I would not blame you for doubting our testimony...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>とはいえ、そう簡単に信じられる事柄でもあるまい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But given your expertise, you must surely have noted the peculiar nature of their souls.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001010_MYSTERYVOICEただ、魂について長年に亘り研究してこられたあなたなら、
彼らの魂が、この世界の者と根本的に異なることが、
おわかりになるのではあるまいか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001020_BEQLUGG<tab>Any other time, and I would have dismissed your stories as balderdash and flummery. But upon closer inspection, 'tis plain their souls are far denser than is normal. And that they do not possess true bodies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001020_BEQLUGG確かに……戯言と退けたくなる話だが、
なるほど、よくよく注意して観察してみれば、
魂の濃さも尋常でなく、肉体を持っておらぬこともわかる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001030_BEQLUGG<tab>Save you. Your body is your own.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001030_BEQLUGG<tab>特に、こちらの御仁は、一段と濃い魂をお持ちだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001040_BEQLUGG<tab>And your soul is the densest of them all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001040_BEQLUGG<tab>しかも、肉体も仮初めのものではなく、本物であろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001050_BEQLUGG<tab>Hmmm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001050_BEQLUGG<tab>ふぅ～む……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As I said before, were it not for their heroism, the skies over Norvrandt would still be awash with Light, the realm yet at the mercy of Vauthry and the sin eaters.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001060_MYSTERYVOICE繰り返すが、彼ら異界からの来訪者の協力なくして、
この世界に夜闇を取り戻すことはできなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>After all they have done for our home, seeing them safely back to their own seems the very least we can do.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001070_MYSTERYVOICEその恩に報いるためにも、
是が非でも、無事に、もとの世界へと帰還させたい。
どうか、ご助力願えないだろうか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001080_BEQLUGG<tab>Hmmm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001080_BEQLUGG<tab>ふぅ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001090_BEQLUGG<tab>Your tale is intriguing. Yes, very intriguing indeed. Simply to hear it is fitting payment in itself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001090_BEQLUGG話を聞くだけのことに対価を求めはしたが、
今、聞いた情報だけでも、十分すぎるほどの価値があろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001100_BEQLUGG<tab>As for your friends...I can but agree. Their valorous deeds on behalf of Norvrandt are deserving of recognition. Of their own fitting payment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001100_BEQLUGGなにより、光に覆われた空に闇を取り戻してくれたというなら、
なるほど確かに、恩に報いるのが筋というもの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You will help us, then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>では……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001120_BEQLUGG<tab>I will. I would see my knowledge put to good use for a change.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001120_BEQLUGGうむ。
我が知恵でよければ、喜んでお貸ししよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001130_BEQLUGG<tab>I do have one condition, however. I am not the spry young Nu Mou I once was. As such, I will require assistance in my fieldwork and testing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001130_BEQLUGGただし、老いぼれゆえに、
新たな研究を始めるとなると、ひとりではいかんともしがたい。
調査やら実験やらで、手を借りることになるが構わんな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001140_ALPHINAUD<tab>It would be our pleasure. We will be laboring for our own benefit, after all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001140_ALPHINAUDもちろんです。
これは私たち自身の問題……
当然、手となり足となり、働かせていただきましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001150_BEQLUGG<tab>Let us begin.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001150_BEQLUGG<tab>それでは始めるぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001160_BEQLUGG<tab>I trust you've prepared the clay?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001160_BEQLUGGこれまで集めてきた素材を、
すべて砕いて混ぜ込んだ粘土は用意できておるな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001170_BEQLUGG<tab>Very good. Now, I would have you sculpt for me...a porxie.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001170_BEQLUGGふむ、よかろう。
では、それを豚の形にコネてみせよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001175_BEQLUGG<tab>Plump, with floppy ears, and a short, curly tail.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001175_BEQLUGG<tab>とびきり、かわいく……な。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001180_ALISAIE<tab>A porxie. I...think I know what you mean...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001180_ALISAIE<tab>わかったわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001190_ALISAIE<tab>There we are. H-How's that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001190_ALISAIE<tab>で、できたわよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well... It is certainly creative. There's no denying that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001200_ALPHINAUDアリゼー、君の作品は……
昔から、独創的……フフ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001210_ALPHINAUD<tab>(SNICKERS)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001210_ALPHINAUD<tab>フフフフフ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001220_ALISAIE<tab>Yes, yes, I'm no artist. Very funny!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001220_ALISAIE<tab>ちょっとそこ、笑うんじゃないわよッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001230_BEQLUGG<tab>Pay him no mind, child. Though it may look like a grotesque parody of reality, it is what the invoker believes that matters.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001230_BEQLUGGよいよい、デキの良し悪しは関係ない。
この潰れたプリンのようなシロモノを術者であるおぬしが、
「とびきりかわいい豚」であると認識できておればいいのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001240_ALISAIE<tab>You're not helping.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001240_ALISAIE<tab>まったくフォローになってないんだけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001250_BEQLUGG<tab>But I speak the truth. If successful, this incantation will turn imagination into reality.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001250_BEQLUGGよいかね……。
魔法とは、空想を現実へと変換する術のことだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001260_BEQLUGG<tab>Which is why the only thing of import is what you believe this figure embodies. You must focus. Hold the porxie's image steady in your mind's eye.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001260_BEQLUGGそれゆえ、術者の認識が重要となる。
イメージさえ強固であれば、見た目に惑わされる必要はない。
よくよく覚えておくのだぞ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001270_BEQLUGG<tab>Now then, as I taught you. Relax, and allow your energies to flow.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001270_BEQLUGG<tab>さあ、教えたとおりの術式で、粘土の豚に魔力を注ぐのだ。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001280_ALISAIEWith flesh of clay I bid thee rise,
On wings of dreams to touch the skies.
What once was idle fantasy,
I call forth to reality!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001280_ALISAIE豚は飛ばず、土は起きず、命分かたれぬのが理なれど、
我が生命の力よ、今ひととき理より離れ、
空飛ぶ豚とならん……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001281_ALISAIE<tab>[Report if label displays]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001281_ALISAIE<tab>あ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001290_BEQLUGG<tab>Hmmm. Not bad for a first attempt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001290_BEQLUGG<tab>ふむ、なかなかのデキではないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001300_BEQLUGG<tab>Now, let us see what can be done for young Halric.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001300_BEQLUGGでは、この使い魔を用いて、
ハルリクとやらの「魂の活性化」を執り行うぞ。
さあ、患者をここへ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001310_BEQLUGG<tab>Through the operation of the magicks you invoked to animate this familiar, it is now replete with the energies required to stir the boy's soul.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001310_BEQLUGGさて、アリゼーよ。
おぬしが創った使い魔には、すでに魂を活性化させる、
一種の強化魔法が備わっている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001320_BEQLUGG<tab>You need but give it a name, and it will do as your heart desires.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001320_BEQLUGGあとは、自身の魔力を注ぎ込みながら、
心に決めた使い魔の名を呼んでやるだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001330_ALISAIE<tab>A name...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001330_ALISAIE<tab>この子の名前…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001340_ALISAIE<tab>All right, I've decided. Now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001340_ALISAIE<tab>うん、決めたわ……やってみる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001350_ALISAIE<tab>Go, Angelo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001350_ALISAIE<tab>いきなさい、アンジェロ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001360_HALRIC<tab>(INCOHERENT MUMBLING)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001360_HALRIC<tab>ア……アアアア……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001370_HALRIC<tab>M... Mother... I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001370_HALRIC<tab>オ母サン……ボク、ハ…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001380_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, thank heavens you're here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001380_DULIACHAIふ、ふたりとも……来てくれたのね！
カイ・シルちゃん、よくやってくれたわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lady Chai, whatever is the matter?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001390_ALPHINAUD<tab>ドゥリア夫人、いったいどうしたというのです？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001400_DULIACHAI<tab>I...I knew not where else to turn. Oh, this is all too much for my poor heart to bear alone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001400_DULIACHAI嗚呼、もう、私、どうしたらいいかわからないの……！
ひとりで、本当に心細くて……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alone? What of Master Chai?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001410_ALPHINAUDひとり……？
確かに旦那様の姿が見えないようですが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001420_DULIACHAI<tab>But that is the very reason I summoned you! He's gone!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001420_DULIACHAIそう、そう、そうなのよ……！
あの人が、私を置いて出ていってしまったの！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001430_ALPHINAUD<tab>What!? What happened!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001430_ALPHINAUDなんですって！？
いったい何故、そんなことに……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001440_DULIACHAI<tab>It all began after the events at Mt. Gulg...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001440_DULIACHAIそれが……アルフィノちゃんは、
しばらくユールモアに残ってくれていたから、
知っているとは思うのだけれど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001450_DULIACHAI<tab>With Lord Vauthry out of the way, we all agreed that a new leader must be chosen...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001450_DULIACHAIあれから、私たち……自由市民が集まって、
ユールモアの新しい元首を選ぼうとしていたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001460_ALPHINAUD<tab>And...so you held an election?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001460_ALPHINAUDヴァウスリーの後任を決めるため、
選挙を実施する計画でしたね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001470_DULIACHAI<tab>Yes. Well...sort of. Not a single person volunteered to stand, you see.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001470_DULIACHAIええ……。
でも、誰も立候補する人がいなかったの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001480_DULIACHAI<tab>After a lifetime of leisure, we free citizens have grown somewhat...indolent. Readapting to the harsh realities of life is trying enough, but to take charge of a broken city as well? No one wanted such responsibility.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001480_DULIACHAI私たち自由市民は、怠惰な時間を過ごしすぎたわ。
我が身の振る舞いを正すだけで精一杯なのに、
混乱した国を率いようという人はいなかったのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001490_DULIACHAI<tab>Nevertheless, Eulmore could not well do without a leader, and so we decided that anyone and everyone should be considered a candidate. And after we cast our ballots and tallied the votes, the mayorship fell upon my dear husband.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001490_DULIACHAIそれで、自由に投票しようということになって……
結果、選ばれたのが、うちの旦那様だったの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well, given the manner in which he orchestrated the construction of the giant Talos, none could deny his leadership qualities.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001500_ALPHINAUDふむ……チャイ・ヌズ殿は、巨大タロースの件でも、
見事にリーダーシップを発揮しておられました。
適任のように思えますが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001510_DULIACHAI<tab>But even before then, he had proven himself at Daedalus Stoneworks, don't forget. He is more than qualified for the role. The perfect choice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001510_DULIACHAI私も、そう思ったわ。
彼は、ダイダロス社を率いていた立派な人だもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001520_DULIACHAI<tab>Indeed, I told him as much when his victory was first announced.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001520_DULIACHAI<tab>だから私、選ばれたときに、背中を押すようなことを言ったの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001530_DULIACHAI<tab>But perhaps I was too forceful in my attempt to encourage him. For shortly after that, he vanished without a word...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001530_DULIACHAIきっと、それがいけなかったのね……。
あの人、そのときを最後に、姿を消してしまったんだから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001531_DULIACHAI<tab><sob>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001531_DULIACHAI<tab>うっうっうっ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001540_ALPHINAUD<tab>You believe he was so daunted by the burden of leadership that he felt compelled to flee...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001540_ALPHINAUD望まぬ大役に推挙され、
重圧に耐えきれず、失踪したと……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001550_ALPHINAUD<tab>Please, Lady Chai, dry your eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001550_ALPHINAUD<tab>ドゥリア夫人、どうか顔をあげてください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Your husband does not strike me as the sort of man who would abandon his duty, much less his beloved wife. There has to be some other reason for his absence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001560_ALPHINAUD私は、旦那様が、愛するあなたを捨て置いて、
逃げてしまうような人物には思えません。
きっと、理由あっての一時的な外出でありましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001570_DULIACHAI<tab>You...you truly think so?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001570_DULIACHAI本当……？
アルフィノちゃん？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001580_DULIACHAI<tab>What about you? What do you think has become of my husband?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001580_DULIACHAI<tab>あなたも、そう思う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>アルフィノの意見に賛成する？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I don't know. But whatever it is, he won't have fled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>賛成する、逃げ出したわけがない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Sorry, but I think he's fled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>賛成しない、逃げ出したに違いない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001600_ALPHINAUD<tab>And there you have it, Lady Chai. You needn't worry. Master Chai loves you more than all the world, and he will return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001600_ALPHINAUD聞いてのとおりです、ドゥリア夫人……。
チャイ・ヌズ殿が、誰よりもあなたを愛していたことは、
ここにいる全員が知っているのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001590_ALPHINAUD<tab>Nay, my friend. The one thing he has not done is flee─of that I am convinced. Through the most testing of times, he has ever remained at Lady Chai's side, placing her happiness before his own. He would not abandon her now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001590_ALPHINAUDいいや、これに関しては「逃げていない」と断言しよう……。
よく考えてみるんだ、チャイ・ヌズ殿は、
いつだってドゥリア夫人に寄り添っていただろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wherever he may have gone, rest assured we will find him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001610_ALPHINAUD旦那様のことは、私が探し出してみせますので、
どうか気を強くお持ちになって、お待ちください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001620_DULIACHAI<tab>Thank you, my dear boy. You have set my mind at ease. I will trust in my husband, and await his return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001620_DULIACHAIありがとう、アルフィノちゃん。
あなたたちを呼んできてもらって正解だったわ……！
私、パーラーのいつもの席で、あの人の帰りを待っているわね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001630_WRENDEN<tab>Well, well... It's you again...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001630_WRENDEN<tab>誰かと思えば……また、お前か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001640_WRENDEN<tab>And I see you've invited your friends. Need them to fight your battles for you, do you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001640_WRENDENしかも、ゾロゾロと連れ立って……
ひとりで説得できぬと見て、助っ人でも呼んできたか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001650_CHAINUZZ<tab>I didn't invite them, as it happens...though they are indeed my friends. Not only mine, but every true Eulmoran's.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001650_CHAINUZZ呼んだわけではないが……確かに彼らは助っ人だ。
いや、正確には、手助けをしてくれた恩人だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001660_CHAINUZZ<tab>They are the ones who awakened us to the truth─to Lord Vauthry's villainy. The famous Warriors of Darkness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001660_CHAINUZZ彼らは、ドン・ヴァウスリーの下で惰眠を貪ってきた私たちを、
目覚めさせてくれた「闇の戦士」たちなのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001670_WRENDEN<tab>Are they now...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001670_WRENDEN<tab>ほう……「闇の戦士」とな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001680_CHAINUZZ<tab>Yes. They are. It would be no exaggeration to call them our saviors. We owe much and more to their kindness. But we cannot depend on that kindness forever.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001680_CHAINUZZだがしかし、いつまでも恩人の優しさに甘え、
助力を受け続けるわけにはいかん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001690_CHAINUZZ<tab>To do so would be little different from entrusting our affairs to Lord Vauthry. Nay, we must learn to stand on our own two feet, and I would have them present to witness my attempt.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001690_CHAINUZZそれでは、ヴァウスリーの力に頼り、
すべてを任せきりにしていた頃と大差がない……。
彼らは助っ人ではなく「立会人」と考えていただきたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001700_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hear, hear, Master Chai!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001700_ALPHINAUD<tab>チャイ・ヌズ殿……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001710_WRENDEN<tab>Your sentiments are admirable. Yet admirable sentiments do not a nation make.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001710_WRENDEN<tab>ふん、殊勝な心がけだが……さてな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001720_WRENDEN<tab>In my capacity as advisor, I once strove to build a better Eulmore. Gave honest counsel to my superiors. Drafted laws for the benefit of one and all...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001720_WRENDEN私は、己を「官僚」であると規定してきた。
民のため、国のため、政を司る者に対して助言を行い、
その方針を最善の方法で実現すべく、働いてきた自負がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001730_WRENDEN<tab>But in time, my values fell out of favor. There was no need for them in this paradise Vauthry was creating. And so I left my homeland behind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001730_WRENDENだが、それは理想を共有できればこそ……。
民が、国が、指導者が……理想とする「楽園」とやらに、
共感できなくなったがゆえに、私はユールモアから去ったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001740_WRENDEN<tab>But you, Chai-Nuzz─you were content to wallow in indolence under Vauthry's auspices. And so I cannot help but ask myself what manner of nation you intend to build.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001740_WRENDENチャイ・ヌズとか言ったか……。
ヴァウスリーの下で奔放な生活を送ってきた貴様が、
いかなる国を築かんとするというのだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001750_CHAINUZZ<tab>I...I can offer no simple answer to that question.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001750_CHAINUZZそ、その問いに一言を以て応じるほどの答えを、
私は……私は、まだ見いだせてはいない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001760_CHAINUZZ<tab>But this much I will say...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001760_CHAINUZZ<tab>だが……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001770_CHAINUZZ<tab>It is my hope that Eulmore can become a nation which her citizens might freely choose to build together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001770_CHAINUZZ<tab>私はいかなる国を築くのかを、市民が語れる国を作りたい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001780_CHAINUZZ<tab>A great many people─myself included─flocked to Eulmore seeking sanctuary. The alternative being to live in fear and die in pain, it seemed an easy choice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001780_CHAINUZZ罪喰いの脅威に怯えて暮らす世界で、
私を含め、多くの者が、身の安全と食料を求めて、
ユールモアに集ってきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001790_CHAINUZZ<tab>And sanctuary we found. As much food and drink as we could ever want, secured at the cost of the surrounding villages. Little wonder the people gathered at our doorstep, begging to work among the bonded.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001790_CHAINUZZ一芸を持ち、身の振り方を決められる労役市民はともかく、
街の周辺に住まう者たちは、食料の配給を断たれ、
今日明日を生き延びることに必死だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001800_CHAINUZZ<tab>The free were blind to it all, of course. Content to─as you say─wallow in indolence. In ignorance...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001800_CHAINUZZ自由市民に至っては、もっと酷い。
未だ酒や快楽に溺れ、現実から目を背け続ける者も少なくない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001810_CHAINUZZ<tab>Were I mayor, I would first take stock of the city's resources, and see that they were assigned equitably. Our days of reckless consumption are behind us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001810_CHAINUZZ今のままでは、早々に富を食いつぶす者も現れるだろう。
私が元首となれば、その権限を以て、
かつて、国に差し出された財産の再分配を行うつもりだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001820_CHAINUZZ<tab>The distinction between free and bonded died with Vauthry. The needs of rich and poor alike must be considered if our nation is to survive.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001820_CHAINUZZ貧者であれ富者であれ、
このような状態では国の未来など語れようものか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001830_CHAINUZZ<tab>To which end, I would take steps to secure channels for supplies, rekindle relations with nearby settlements, reestablish industry, reach out to neighboring nations...and the list goes on and on.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001830_CHAINUZZ食料の早急な確保、周辺集落との関係改善、
崩壊した産業の再建に、他地域との連携強化……。
課題は、まさに山積みだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001840_CHAINUZZ<tab>But I am no ruler, nor even a politician─I am an entrepreneur.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001840_CHAINUZZ私は、政治家でも国王でもない。
ダイダロス社の跡取り……企業家だ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001850_CHAINUZZ<tab>My expertise lie in planning and profit. I haven't the knowledge or experience to run a nation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001850_CHAINUZZそんな私にできることは、
問題を分析し、改善案を企画し、
収益を上げて部下を食わせること……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001860_CHAINUZZ<tab>Please, Wrenden. Will you not help me? Together, we could solve the city's problems. Build a Eulmore for the people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001860_CHAINUZZレンデン殿……ユールモアの民が、
国の理想を思い描き、政に手を挙げられるようになるまで……
どうか力を貸していただきたい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001870_WRENDEN<tab>A Eulmore for the people...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001870_WRENDEN<tab>いかなる国を築くのかを、民が語れる国か……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001880_WRENDEN<tab>I rather like the sound of that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001880_WRENDEN<tab>悪くない方針だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001890_WRENDEN<tab>But before I offer you my counsel, I would be certain of your ability to perform the duties of office.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001890_WRENDENチャイ・ヌズよ……。
お前がいっときとはいえ国政を担うに相応しい器か、
試させてもらうとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001900_CHAINUZZ<tab>You would?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001900_CHAINUZZ<tab>な、なにをすればいい……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001910_WRENDEN<tab>You ask me to help you solve Eulmore's problems, but first, I would see you solve one on your own. Accomplish that, and you will prove both to me and the people that you are a man worth following.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001910_WRENDEN今、ユールモアが抱える問題のひとつを解決してもらう。
そうでなければ、改革など夢のまた夢、
誰もお前についてはこないだろうからな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001911_WRENDEN<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001911_WRENDEN<tab>フン。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001920_CHAINUZZ<tab>Right. Right, then. Form a line and make for Eulmore!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001920_CHAINUZZよし、そのまま一列になって、
ユールモアへ向かえ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001930_DIRTYMAN<tab>Hm? What's that noise?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001930_DIRTYMAN<tab>なんだ、この音は……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001940_DIRTYMAN<tab>Wicked white! Runaway Talos!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001940_DIRTYMANタ、タロース……！？
壊れたタロースが暴走してやがるのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001950_DIRTYMAN<tab>Call the guard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001950_DIRTYMAN<tab>おい、誰か……番兵を呼んできてくれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001960_EULMORANSOLDIER<tab>Stay back, all of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001960_EULMORANSOLDIER<tab>(-ユールモア軍の兵士-)市民の方は、お下がりください……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001970_DULIACHAI<tab>Is that...!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001970_DULIACHAI<tab>まって……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001980_DULIACHAI<tab>Darling, you're back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001980_DULIACHAI嗚呼、あなた……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001990_CHAINUZZ<tab>Well of course I'm back. You didn't s─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_001990_CHAINUZZ<tab>も、もちろん、帰ってくるに……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002000_CHAINUZZ<tab>Dear─ Dearest─ I─ I can't─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002000_CHAINUZZ<tab>ぐぁっ……く、苦しぃ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002010_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh! Oh dear...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002010_DULIACHAI<tab>あらあら、まぁまぁ、どうしましょう……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002020_CHAINUZZ<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002020_CHAINUZZ<tab>ふぅ……助かった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002030_DULIACHAI<tab>I'm sorry, my darling... It's just, the sight of you filled me with such joy, I couldn't help myself...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002030_DULIACHAIごめんなさい、あなた……
帰ってきてくれたのが嬉しくて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002040_CHAINUZZ<tab>It's all right, dear. I should just have come out and said what it was I was intending, instead of entrusting the task to a hastily scribbled letter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002040_CHAINUZZいや、構わん。
それよりも、置き手紙だけでなく、
しっかり、言葉で伝えてから外出すべきだった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002050_DULIACHAI<tab>Does that mean you'll do it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002050_DULIACHAI<tab>それじゃあ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002060_CHAINUZZ<tab>Well, I'm here, aren't I? I mean, not that my absence signified any unwillingness, you understand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002060_CHAINUZZ……う、うむ。
私は、元首の座から逃れるために、
ユールモアを出ていったわけではない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002070_CHAINUZZ<tab>Naught could be further from the truth! I only left to enlist the aid of the former mayor's senior advisor.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002070_CHAINUZZ補佐官としてレンデン殿を迎えるために交渉に行っていたのだ。
その助力を得られた今、ようやく私は胸を張って言える。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002080_CHAINUZZ<tab>And now that I have it, I believe I am ready to take office.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002080_CHAINUZZ私は、ユールモアの元首の役目を、
引き受けさせてもらう、と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002090_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, how wonderful!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002090_DULIACHAIまぁまぁまぁ！
なんて、おめでたいのかしら……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002091_CHAINUZZ<tab>[Report if label displays]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002091_CHAINUZZ<tab>あ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002095_CHAINUZZ<tab>Dearest... Please...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002095_CHAINUZZ<tab>にぃぎゃああああーー！！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002100_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ah, er... Ahem...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002100_CHAINUZZ<tab>えー、あー……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002110_DULIACHAI<tab>Go on, dear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002110_DULIACHAI<tab>あなた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002120_CHAINUZZ<tab>Thank you all for gathering here today.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002120_CHAINUZZ<tab>皆、今日はよく集まってくれた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002130_CHAINUZZ<tab>Before going any further─could I...could I ask the free citizens of Eulmore to look around?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002130_CHAINUZZまず、自由市民の諸君……。
周囲を見渡してほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002140_CHAINUZZ<tab>'Tis a sight none of us would ever have seen under Lord Vauthry's rule.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002140_CHAINUZZドン・ヴァウスリー施政下の20年間とは、
異なる顔ぶれが混じっていることに気づくだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002150_CHAINUZZ<tab>Not only do we stand in the familiar presence of those we once called the bonded...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002150_CHAINUZZ我々に仕えてくれていた、
労役市民たちはもちろん……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002160_CHAINUZZ<tab>...But today we welcome the peoples of the Derelicts and Gatetown too.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002160_CHAINUZZ廃船街やゲートタウンに住まう、市民権を持たない者もいる……。
そしてなにより……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002170_CHAINUZZ<tab>Today we welcome the Warriors of Darkness, come to bear witness to Eulmore's new beginning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002170_CHAINUZZ我らを目覚めさせてくれた恩人、
「闇の戦士」たちもまた、新たな出発となる今日という日に、
立会人として駆けつけてくれた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002180_CHAINUZZ<tab>As you know, an election was recently held, at the end of which I had the honor of being chosen to succeed Lord Vauthry.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002180_CHAINUZZ先日、自由市民たちの間で行われた選挙にて、
私、チャイ・ヌズが、ドン・ヴァウスリーの後任として、
新たな元首に選出された。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002190_CHAINUZZ<tab>You place great faith in me, and I promise to do my utmost to live up to your expectations. And I will seek always to carry out the duties of this office with integrity and fairness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002190_CHAINUZZそして私は、名誉あるこの務めを受けさせていただくことを、
この場にいる全員の前で、宣言する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002200_CHAINUZZ<tab>Always, I say, but not forever. Let it be known that I do not intend to hold this post indefinitely. I consider myself but an acting mayor who will serve only for the interim, while Eulmore is reshaped according to a new set of values.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002200_CHAINUZZ<tab>ただし、期限付きの一時的な「元首代行」として、だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002210_CHAINUZZ<tab>No longer can we think of ourselves as divided. As the free and the bonded. Citizens and non-citizens.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002210_CHAINUZZ自由市民と労役市民の関係……
そして、市民と非市民の関係……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002220_CHAINUZZ<tab>The systems put in place by Lord Vauthry must be undone. But even as we tear down the old, we must give thought to the new. To what manner of nation Eulmore should become.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002220_CHAINUZZドン・ヴァウスリーの下で決められた歪んだ制度を正すとして、
ユールモアという国を、いかなる国にするのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002230_CHAINUZZ<tab>Whatever the answer may be, it cannot be decided by one man alone. And so I propose that an open forum be held, that we might all discuss how best to strive towards a better future.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002230_CHAINUZZこの大きな問題について、
私は、ここにいるすべての者が意見を交わし、
議論する必要があると考えている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002240_CHAINUZZ<tab>However, there can be no talk of the morrow unless we first address the issues of today.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002240_CHAINUZZだが、我々が直面している現実の問題の前では、
理想を語り合う余裕など無いというのが実情だろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002250_CHAINUZZ<tab>Securing new sources of food, rebuilding relations with our neighbors, re-establishing industry─there is much and more that needs to be done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002250_CHAINUZZメオルに依存してきた食料問題、
冷え込んだ周辺集落、他地域との関係改善、
治安維持に、産業再興……喫緊の課題があまりに多い。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002260_CHAINUZZ<tab>Too much for a mere man of business. And so I pledge instead to do everything in my power to ensure our city's security and stability while we all work together to see these problems solved.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002260_CHAINUZZゆえに私は、ひとりの企業家として、
まずは、ここにいる皆の安全と安心を優先しようと思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002270_CHAINUZZ<tab>The road before us will not be easy, and I know full well how daunting the prospect of honest labor may seem to some of you...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002270_CHAINUZZ当然、ヴァウスリーが築いた偽りの楽園で、
怠惰な時を過ごしてきた、私を含む自由市民にとっては、
多くの痛みを伴う改革も必要となろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002280_CHAINUZZ<tab>But we must accept the reality of our circumstances. We must move forward.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002280_CHAINUZZ<tab>だが、夢から覚めた私たちは、現実を生きてゆかねばならない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002290_CHAINUZZ<tab>This much we owe to ourselves, and to the brave heroes who risked their lives to bring back the night.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002290_CHAINUZZ私たちのために命を賭して、
天より光を払い、闇を取り戻してくれた、
「闇の戦士」たちに恥じぬ生き方を……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002300_CHAINUZZ<tab>Once we have shored up our city's foundations, and regained some semblance of normality, let us reconvene to speak of the future.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002300_CHAINUZZそして、皆の暮らしが安定してきたそのとき、
改めて理想のユールモアについて、話し合わせてほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002310_CHAINUZZ<tab>Until then, I humbly ask that you lend me, and each other, your strength. For Eulmore!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002310_CHAINUZZだから、それまでの間、どうかこの私に……
いや、ユールモアという希望に、皆の力を貸してもらいたい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002320_KRILE<tab>Sorry to keep you waiting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002320_KRILE<tab>おまたせしちゃったわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002330_KRILE<tab>I have carried out the treatment as per Master Matoya's instructions. It should slow the destabilization of their corporeal aether quite significantly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002330_KRILEマトーヤ様からの助言を受けて、
みんなの体に、ひとまずの処置をしたところよ。
これで今しばらくは、生命力の揺らぎも安定してくれるはず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002340_KRILE<tab>But tell me, how fare our friends in the First?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002340_KRILEそれで……第一世界での、
みんなの様子はどうだったの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002350_TATARU<tab>So this Beq Lugg's the First's leading authority on soulcraft, are they? Sounds promising!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002350_TATARUなるほど……
そのベーク＝ラグさんという方の協力で、
少しずつ帰る方法の研究が始まっているのでっすね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002360_KRILE<tab>And Urianger's proffered solution of white auracite is rather ingenious now that I think of it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002360_KRILE確かに「白聖石」を使って魂を運ぶというのは、
いいアイディアだと思うわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002370_KRILE<tab>Well, while they press on with their preparations, you may rest assured we will continue to do our part here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002370_KRILEなら私たちは、研究の進展を信じて、
肉体の維持に全力を尽くさなくっちゃね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002380_ESTINIEN<tab>Oh. You're back.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002380_ESTINIEN(-？？？？-)折よく、来てくれていたか。
話が早くて助かる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002390_ESTINIEN<tab>And none the worse for wear, I see.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002390_ESTINIENよう……。
無事に旅先から戻ったようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002400_TATARU<tab>Estinien! Oh, thank the gods. We've been worried sick! Did you lose your linkpearl or something!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002400_TATARUエスティニアンさん……！
連絡が取れなくなって、心配していまっした！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002410_ESTINIEN<tab>The situation in Garlemald has become more complicated. I was making my escape from the capital when I ran into one of yours─Riol. He thought it best we come straight here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002410_ESTINIEN動乱の帝都から脱出して、帰還しようとしていた道中で、
リオルとかいう「暁」の密偵と出会ってな……。
ひとまず、ここに立ち寄らせてもらった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002420_TATARU<tab>More complicated how?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002420_TATARU帝都で動乱って……
いったい何があったのでっすか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002430_ESTINIEN<tab>Hm. Where to begin?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002430_ESTINIEN<tab>さて、どこから話したものか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002435_ESTINIEN<tab>After entering the Empire via Radz-at-Han, I went about my mission of investigating Black Rose.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002435_ESTINIENお前たちから帝国の秘密兵器の調査と始末を依頼され、
ラザハン経由で、帝国領に潜入したんだが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002440_ESTINIEN<tab>It was then, inside a provincial factory, that I encountered the one who styles himself Shadowhunter. Gaius Baelsar.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002440_ESTINIENある属州の魔導工場で、漆黒の王狼……
いや、今は影の狩人と名乗っているんだったか。
とにかく、ガイウス・バエサルと出会ってな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002450_ESTINIEN<tab>Our goals being apparently aligned, we joined forces and ventured on into the heart of the capital─to the very imperial palace itself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002450_ESTINIEN<tab>共闘を打診され、帝都まで同行することになったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002460_ESTINIEN<tab>There, we found a man whom all assumed dead.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002460_ESTINIENそして、その中枢……魔導城にて、
俺たちは驚くべき人物と出会うことになる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002470_ESTINIEN<tab>But his soul lives on. And he has wrested back his flesh.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002470_ESTINIEN<tab>アシエンから肉体を奪い返した、あの男……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002475_ESTINIEN<tab>Zenos yae Galvus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002475_ESTINIEN<tab>ゼノス・イェー・ガルヴァスだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002480_ESTINIEN<tab>Nor did the surprises end there. For no sooner had we arrived than he murdered his sire in cold blood. The Emperor is dead. This sent Gaius into a rage, and he charged in, blade drawn...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002480_ESTINIENしかも、奴は俺たちの目の前で、
父親でもある皇帝ヴァリスを殺害……。
激昂したガイウスが、ゼノスに斬りかかり……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002490_ESTINIEN<tab>What's wrong!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002490_ESTINIEN<tab>お、おい……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002670_TATARU<tab>Are you all right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002670_TATARU<tab>大丈夫でっすか、冒険者さん、クルルさん！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002680_ESTINIEN<tab>Peer into my past, did you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002680_ESTINIEN<tab>俺の過去を視た、といったところか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002690_KRILE<tab>Well, I didn't quite relive the experience as you did, but I bore witness to it all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002690_KRILE私が視た光景も同じよ。
さすがに、追体験するほどの強烈な幻視じゃなかったけれど。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002700_ESTINIEN<tab>I'm still not sure what I think of this gift of yours. But no matter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002700_ESTINIENやれやれ、その異能を直に見たのは久しぶりだが、
なんとも奇妙なものだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002710_ESTINIEN<tab>Our confrontation was cut short when the imperial guard arrived. It was then that Zenos took his leave. Citing boredom.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002710_ESTINIENともかく、肉体を取り戻したゼノスは、
近衛兵が来ると、興ざめしただのとぬかして消えやがった。
その後の行方はようとして知れず、だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002720_KRILE<tab>To think their research into the Echo could bear such fruit...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002720_KRILE……まさか、あのときのアラミゴでの「超える力」の研究が、
こんな大事を引き起こすだなんて。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002730_KRILE<tab>Escaping death, jumping from one body to the next, and returning to his own after all this time... He is an Ascian in all but name.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002730_KRILE死を超越して、他者に憑依してたばかりじゃなく、
自身の体を取り戻したなんて……信じられる？
まるで、不滅なるアシエンだわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002740_ESTINIEN<tab>It beggars belief, aye. But no more than a hero traversing the rift between worlds.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002740_ESTINIEN常識外という点では、次元の狭間を超えて、
異界を旅してきた、どこぞの英雄殿も大概だとは思うがな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002750_ESTINIEN<tab>My concerns are far more prosaic. With the Emperor dead and the crown prince missing, the Empire is in disarray.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002750_ESTINIENともかく、皇帝を失った上に、
皇太子だったゼノスも消えたとあって、帝国は大荒れだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002760_ESTINIEN<tab>Until order is restored─assuming it even possible─we needn't fear an imperial reprisal. And for reasons of his own, Zenos took it upon himself to rid the world of Black Rose.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002760_ESTINIENしばらくは、侵略戦争どころじゃあるまい。
「黒薔薇」に関しても、理由はどうあれゼノスが使用を阻止した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002770_ESTINIEN<tab>Riol has already gone to apprise the Alliance leaders of these developments. We may leave the matter in their hands for now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002770_ESTINIENこれらの情報は、今頃、リオルとやらが、
エオルゼア同盟軍に伝えているはずだからな。
あとはアイメリクたち、お偉方に任せていいだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002780_KRILE<tab>Then perhaps we have seen the last of the fighting at Ghimlyt. Though if it comes to civil war, I cannot help but fear for the provinces...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002780_KRILE確かにギムリトの戦場も落ち着きそうね。
内乱となれば帝国の属州の今後が心配だけれど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002790_KRILE<tab>Ah, I'd nearly forgotten to ask─what became of Gaius? Did he not escape with you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002790_KRILEところで、ガイウスはどうしているの？
途中までは、いっしょだったのでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002800_ESTINIEN<tab>That he did, but we parted ways shortly after leaving Garlemald. He claimed another threat had arisen which demanded his attention.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002800_ESTINIENああ、奴とは帝国本土を脱出した後で別れた。
なんでも「新たな脅威」を察知したとかでな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002810_ESTINIEN<tab>He didn't elaborate, but the absence of some device or other in the capital gave him reason to believe they're planning something.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002810_ESTINIEN詳しいことはわからんが、奴と過去に因縁のある存在が、
皇帝不在の状況で、動き出した気配があるそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002820_ESTINIEN<tab>Lest you worry, I believe he has well and truly shed the Black Wolf's pelt. Conquest is no longer his objective. We may safely leave him to his own devices.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002820_ESTINIENいっときとはいえ、ともに行動して感じたが、
もはやガイウスはエオルゼア侵略を企むような男じゃない。
自由にやらせておけばいいさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002830_TATARU<tab>Well, it's nice to have one less foe to worry about...even if we do have a mysterious new threat to look out for instead.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002830_TATARUそうでっすね。
でも、「新たな脅威」と言われると、
なんだか漠然とした不安を感じてしまいまっす。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002840_TATARU<tab>Speaking of which, I'll see that Riol and our shinobi are made aware. Though we still know next to nothing, it can't hurt to be vigilant.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002840_TATARUリオルさんや東方の忍びさんたちに情報を共有して、
警戒を強めた方がいいかもしれまっせんね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002850_ESTINIEN<tab>Well then, with Black Rose nipped in the bud, I believe I've fulfilled my part of the bargain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002850_ESTINIENさて、俺からの報告は以上だ。
対応を依頼された「黒薔薇」の脅威も去った今、
契約は終了ってことでいいんだろう……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002860_TATARU<tab>That's...true, buuut...with the Archons still slumbering away, we were hoping you might agree to stay with us for a little bit longer...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002860_TATARUは、はい……それはそうなのでっすが……。
賢人のみなさんも、まだお目覚めになっていない状況でっす。
よければ、もう少しここで一緒に……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002870_ESTINIEN<tab>Sorry, but I'm not inclined to extend my contract. Gaius isn't the only one with business to attend to.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002870_ESTINIEN悪いが、約束は約束だ。
……ガイウスがそうしているように、
俺も好きにやらせてもらう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002880_KRILE<tab>Thank you for your help then, Estinien. I see why Alphinaud admires you so.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002880_KRILE突然の協力要請に応えてくれて感謝しているわ。
アルフィノくんが慕うだけのことはあるわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002890_ESTINIEN<tab>Hmph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002890_ESTINIEN<tab>……フン。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002900_ESTINIEN<tab>Farewell, my friend. See that you don't make a habit of dozing off in battle.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002900_ESTINIENそれじゃあな、相棒。
今度は戦場で倒れるような、危なっかしいことはしてくれるなよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002910_KRILE<tab>Hmm. I suppose we should all be getting on, then. As ever, we will see to the Archons' needs. In the meantime, why not get some rest? You've more than earned it. Go on.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05100_002910_KRILEさあ、私たちも解散しましょう。
賢人たちの肉体についてはこっちに任せて、
あなたは、ゆっくり身体を休めておいてね。
